page.title: 03LOCAL SHOPS
page.content: Villages sometimes have a local store or a little shopping center. We surveyed the main shops at Heelands. { Martins Quality Fruit and Veg.}They work 12 hours a day, 72 hours a week. 8 people work there. The most popular thing sold is potatoes.{ M&J Hardware {LTD DIY Home and Garden.}They work 9 hours a day 54 a week.2 people work there.The most popular thing sold there is dustbin bags.{Mr Dutsons {Bread Shop. }The person we interviewed worked 20 hours a week .The most popular thing sold is doughnuts and bread rolls.{Chemist Chapharm LTD. They work 12 hours a day 72 hours a week.6 people work there.The most popular thing sold there is pain killers and baby products.{P&M Family {Butchers.}They work 14 hours a day 84 a week.3 people work there.They couldn't name any pop. item.
